verbose_text: We further studied the expression of key signal transduction molecules of the different studied M1 stimulatory pathways (Syk, Stat1, Irf3, and Traf6), and showed a significant 9-fold increased expression of Syk, a central molecule in CD8, FcgammaR, and Clec4 signal transduction pathway (P < 0.001; XREF_FIG).
